title: Q3 Launch Risk Review
author: Dan
summary: The document reviews the risks associated with the Q3 launch, focusing on operational and market-based challenges. Key risks include supply chain delays due to overseas dependencies, regulatory review timelines, and potential overlaps with competitor product announcements. Proposed mitigation strategies include increasing pre-launch inventory buffers, establishing parallel approval tracks, and executing a staggered regional rollout to reduce the probability of launch failure and maintain market positioning.
